title: Kompas Antivirus 3.0.9
description:
Kompas Antivirus 3.0.9

 <a href="
http://antivirus.terbaru.link/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://antivirus.terbaru.link/</a>
------------------


Apa Yang Terbaru (14 Februari 2015)
----------------------------------
- Fitur Exe Blocker untuk memblok ancaman CryptoLocker/CTB Locker
  yang dijalankan dari attachment email.
- Fitur USB Paranoid untuk memblok ancaman malware dari removable disk.
- Perbaikan minor bugs.


Kompas antivirus is free antivirus software and designed to fight off all malware types especially to detect
RATs, keyloggers, stealers, crypters, binders, spywares, worms and more. 

Just relying on a single vendor is not sufficient to completely protect you. You do need a second layer to make sure you are secure. 

Kompas Antivirus features simple interface to make it simple and easy to use and it can be carried on a USB drive to quickly scan any computer(s) for malware.

    - Fast and Light Scan Engine

    - Automatic Priority Updates and Scheduled Scanning

    - Real-Time File System Protection Blocks Known Threats

    - Advanced Heuristic Protection Prevents New Zero Day Malware Infection

    - Best USB Antivirus Detects All Kinds of Threat in Removable Media

    - Best Detection for Encrypted VBS Malwares

    - Additional Tools Unhides Files/Folders, Restores Hijacked Browser and many more
